content: Translation services: Â  Â English <=> FrenchIf you're looking for a French<=>English translation service, I am available. I provide high quality translations, with short deadlines, and am an active member of this community. I translate the following (but not limited to):- ANN threads & ICOs- white papers- websites & blogs articles- various articlesThe price is to be defined according to the request. Don't hesitate to contact me privately, or to leave a message in this topic if you need any more information.
